name: mm-list-item
description: An element used to wrap individual items in components that require lists of items, such as mm-dropdown and mm-menu.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: Whether or not this item is currently selected. This can be set as an attribute to provide a default value.

attributes.name: highlighted
attributes.description: Whether or not this item is highlighted. The user can highlight an item by mousing over it or navigating using the keyboard arrow keys.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Native HTML attribute. A String of text to show when hovering over this mm-list-item, useful for displaying the full label in contexts where available space is limited (e.g. an mm-dropdown with overflow=hidden)

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The actual value associated with this list item. Useful in situations where displaying a human-readable name is preferred to the actual value.
